options.

buttons and knobs to customize your reflect experience.

whitelist time.

time allowed on a website after successful intent (minutes).

number of intent entries.

number of most recent intents shown in the analytics panel.

 

sites.

a list of sites you would like to be more mindful of. sites added here will have the reflect prompt shown to you.


analytics.

a list showing your most recent entries.


a bar graph showing the details of your reflect usage over the past seven days.
